title: Chin Tucks
description: Relieves forward-head posture strain and activates deep neck muscles, helping reduce neck and upper-back tension caused by long hours at a desk.

title: Side Neck Stretch
description: Releases tight side-neck muscles and improves flexibility, easing stiffness that builds up from prolonged screen use.

title: Seated Neck Rotation
description: Relieves built-up neck stiffness and improves range of motion, helping reduce tension from extended sitting.

title: Upper Body & Arm Stretch
description: Opens the chest and shoulders while releasing upper-body tightness caused by rounded desk posture.

title: Triceps Stretch
description: Reduces upper-arm and shoulder tension while improving arm mobility after long periods of keyboard use.

title: Seated Side Stretch
description: Lengthens the spine and side muscles, helping counter spinal compression from prolonged sitting.

title: Pectoralis Stretch
description: Opens tight chest muscles and supports better posture by reversing forward-rounded shoulders.

title: Seated Hip Stretch
description: Releases tight hip muscles and improves lower-body mobility restricted by extended sitting.

title: Knee Extensions
description: Improves knee joint movement and promotes healthy blood flow in the legs after inactivity.

title: Heel Slides
description: Gently restores knee and leg mobility while improving circulation during seated breaks.

title: Sit to Stands
description: Activates major lower-body muscles and boosts circulation, helping reset the body after long periods of sitting.

title: Seated Calf Raises
description: Improves lower-leg circulation and reduces stiffness caused by prolonged immobility.

title: Wrist Flexor Stretch
description: Relieves wrist and forearm strain from repetitive typing and mouse use.

title: Wrist Circles
description: Loosens stiff wrist joints and improves range of motion for smoother hand movement.

title: Eye Circles
description: Reduces eye fatigue and refreshes visual focus after continuous screen exposure.
